oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SAPO-46 MOLECULAR-SIEVE - INCORPORATION OF SILICON AT CRYSTALLOGRAPHICALLY INDEPENDENT SITES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PRAKASH, AM
SATYANARAYANA, CVV
ASHTEKAR, S
CHAKRABARTY, DK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: nuclear-magnetic-resonance
al
si
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Silicon substitution for phosphorus at crystallographically distinct sites resulting in the creation of two silicon environments has been observed in SAPO-46 molecular sieves.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY-CHEMICAL COMMUNICATIONS, (13), 1527-1528
